item.title: CVE-2022-45479|2024-08-03T14:17:03.462Z -- beappsmobile -- pc%20keyboard%20wifi%20%26%20bluetooth
item.description: PC Keyboard allows remote unauthenticated users to send instructions to the server to execute arbitrary code without any previous authorization or authentication. CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H
